page.title: 10MY DAY - BY KATIE LEONARD
page.content: I get up at 07.30, have a wash, get dressed and have breakfast. I pack my bag and set off for school at 8.30. At school we do all sorts of things. There are 34 children in our class aged from 9 to 11. I like reading; I have read 31 books in this class. I like a lot of sports and P.E. I don't like doing handwriting or difficult Maths. We finish school at 15.30 and I go straight home. Usually I play outside with my friends Emma, Sally and Nicola. We ride our bikes and play on roller boots. At 17.00 we have tea -sandwiches or maybe beans on toast. After tea we watch T.V. I watch about 1 hour per weekday in the summer but more in the winter. I sometimes play tennis and go to Guides on Tuesday and Youth Club on Friday. I go dancing on Saturday morning. Bedtime is 20.45
